title: Check the Leading Coefficient
text: Given any parabola in the form $${ax}^2+bx+c$$, a is called the leading coefficient of the parabola. If a is negative, the parabola opens downward. If a is positive, the parabola opens upward.

title: Check the Leading Coefficient
text: In the given question, $$a=1$$ which is positive, so the parabola opens upward.
